net.sue445.s3tiger.rules
Class ControllerResource

java.lang.Object
  org.junit.rules.ExternalResource
      net.sue445.s3tiger.rules.ControllerResource
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.junit.rules.TestRule
public class ControllerResource
extends org.junit.rules.ExternalResource

initialize appengine resource at test class field. you don't need extends ControllerTestCase

 public class SomeControllerTest{
     @Rule
     public ControllerResource resource = new ControllerResource(SomeControllerTest.class);

     @Test
     public void test(){
     }
 }
